[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@visualization-tools/core](./core.md) &gt; [InteractionGroup](./core.interactiongroup.md)

## InteractionGroup class

Entities in this group have the same requirements as [IHitTestableGroup](./core.ihittestablegroup.md)<!-- -->. Allows up to 32 `IInteractionGroup`<!-- -->s per plot for click / hover handlers etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class InteractionGroup<TUpdateArg, TStore, TTraits extends IHitTestableTrait> extends AEntityGroup<IHitTestableGroupOptions<TUpdateArg, TTraits, TStore>, IHitTestableTrait> implements IInteractionGroup<TUpdateArg, TStore, TTraits> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [AEntityGroup](./core.aentitygroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IHitTestableGroupOptions](./core.ihittestablegroupoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;TUpdateArg, TTraits, TStore&gt;, [IHitTestableTrait](./core.ihittestabletrait.md)<!-- -->&gt;

<b>Implements:</b> [IInteractionGroup](./core.iinteractiongroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;TUpdateArg, TStore, TTraits&gt;

## Remarks

`IInteractionGroup`<!-- -->s should share `IHitTestableGroup`<!-- -->s to avoid duplicate work. Each entity is allowed a single [IHitTestableGroup](./core.ihittestablegroup.md) shared between all `IInteractionGroup`<!-- -->s but may have a unique [IHitAllowedComponent](./core.ihitallowedcomponent.md) per group.
